data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xing, Ji-Chun, Dai, Ren-Huai, Li, Zi-Zhong (2010): The leafhopper genus Alishania Vilbaste in China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2344: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193360
